page.title: 20EDUCATION: (2) QUINTON
page.content: There is good pre-school provision for 3 year olds and above. This is a civilian group, with a number of service families involved. Playschool uses army accommodation and caters for about 24 children. Good links between school and playschool exist. Areas of study at the village school include maths, language, music, games, environmental studies,religion, craft, swimming, art and history. There are many visitors to the village school to help in the education programme.Parents and other volunteers assist with all areas of school work, and help to raise funds for books and equipment. This entry for Domesday 1985 could not have been completed without the help of children, parents, teachers and friends of Quinton Primary School.
